org.fa.api

Interface State

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StateImpl

    public interface State
    Represents a State of the Finite Automata

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addStateTransition(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String stateId)
      Add a transition from this state to another state
      java.lang.String getStateId() 
      java.lang.String getStateTransition(java.lang.String input) 
      boolean isAccepted()

      set if the current state is an accepted state or not

    • Method Detail

      • getStateId

        java.lang.String getStateId()
        Returns:
        the unique ID of the state

      • isAccepted

        boolean isAccepted()
        Returns:
        True if the state is an accepted state and False otherwise

      • setAccepted

        void setAccepted(boolean accepted)
        set if the current state is an accepted state or not
        Parameters:
        accepted - True if the state is an accepted state and False otherwise

      • addStateTransition

        void addStateTransition(java.lang.String input,
                      java.lang.String stateId)
        Add a transition from this state to another state
        Parameters:
        input - input character which enables the state transition
        stateId - Id of the next state

      • getStateTransition

        java.lang.String getStateTransition(java.lang.String input)
        Parameters:
        input - A character which induce the state transition
        Returns:
        the ID of the state if a transition is found, and null otherwise
